channel.title: Im confuzzled (thats my word lolz)
channel.description: alright i am unsure if this is a client issue or a server issue so i am posting here.. i have a special crown made for me (the owner) only.. but i still get the admin crown after my client coder installed it... how do i make this active?

item.title: Im confuzzled (thats my word lolz)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

alright… wel would you have any idea what file it would be in? i have a copy of skittlez345’s client… if u dont wanna say then alright…
btw: is there a section for help for this?? since it is client help and not server now that i found out??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 10:15:08 pm[/size][hr]alright well all i wanna do is add owner crown… not change what crowns go where…
i have 3 crowns in the book. and i would like all 3 to work…i searched EVERY client file in the main part… class30_sub2_sub1…i have no idea how to add that extra crown… and i have played a server with…donator… mod…admin… coowner. and owner crowns before… so i know its possible

else if (s.equalsIgnoreCase("mod_icons"))
{
try
{
				Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./sprites/MODICONS "+i+".png");			//System.getProperty("user.dir") + "\\"+i+".png");
				anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
				PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
				pixelgrabber.grabPixels();
//System.out.println(s+" "+i+".png"+ " hopefully loaded");
			}
			catch (Exception exception)
			{
				System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
			}
		}
else {
        if(i1 == 0)
        {
            for(int k1 = 0; k1 < j1; k1++)
                anIntArray1439[k1] = ai[class30_sub2_sub2.method408()];

            return;
        }
        if(i1 == 1)
        {
            for(int l1 = 0; l1 < anInt1440; l1++)
            {
                for(int i2 = 0; i2 < anInt1441; i2++)
                    anIntArray1439[l1 + i2 * anInt1440] = ai[class30_sub2_sub2.method408()];

            }
           }
        }

if u think u can fix it… plz just help me out… ive been at this issue for a month or 2… and finally decided to give up at it

item.title: Im confuzzled (thats my word lolz)
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

Client side. You have to find the sprite id that is inputted into the client for admin crowns, and change it to the new sprite id.

Read full topic
